--- schema
type SimpleStruct struct {
  foo Int
  bar Bool
  baz String
}
--- expectedparsed
{
  "SimpleStruct": {
    "kind": "struct",
    "fields": {
      "foo": {
        "type": "Int"
      },
      "bar": {
        "type": "Bool"
      },
      "baz": {
        "type": "String"
      }
    },
    "representation": { "map": {}}
  }
}
--- block1
{
  "foo": 100,
  "bar": true,
  "baz": "this is baz yo"
}
--- expectedloaded1
{
  "foo": 100,
  "bar": true,
  "baz": "this is baz yo"
}
---
